text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump 🤦‍♀️donald*, you don't take insulin cuz "maybe I should". Do you talk to anyone before these pressers? Before you ramble inanely for what seems like an eternity? 🤦‍♀️Humiliated, yet again. #TrumpHasNoPlan because he's the #IdiotInChief https://t.co/TL2sYvRkpY
